scripts.test.saucelabs.us: env SAUCE_BUILD="TestCafe Build - $(date)" SAUCE_SCREEN_RESOLUTION='1920x1080' node tests/configs/saucelabs.config.js
scripts.test.saucelabs.eu: env SAUCE_BUILD="TestCafe Build - $(date)" SAUCE_SCREEN_RESOLUTION='1920x1080' SAUCE_API_HOST=eu-central-1.saucelabs.com node tests/configs/saucelabs.config.js
